sentences.english: But farther south Turkey is on virgin turf.
sentences.chinese: 而土耳其的南部偏遠地區卻是一片蠻荒之地。

sentences.english: It originated in the beginning period of human beings.
sentences.chinese: 射獵活動源於人類最初的蠻荒時代。

sentences.english: Some say it is wild and uncivilized.
sentences.chinese: 有些人說這是一片未開化的蠻荒之地。

sentences.english: Therefore, the cyberspace is in many ways, an untamed frontier.
sentences.chinese: 因此，網絡空間是在許多方面，一個蠻荒的邊界。

sentences.english: Hergé wanted to draw cartoons about the Wild West of America.
sentences.chinese: 埃爾熱希望這部連環畫講述美國西部蠻荒地區的故事。

definition: destitute and homeless (idiom); forced from one's home and wandering about/displaced
lit. you hoodwink me and I cheat you (idiom); fig. mutual deception/each tries to outwit the other/dog eats dog and devil take the hindmost
a thousand pounds hangs by a thread (idiom)/imminent peril/a matter of life or death
no sign of human habitation (idiom); desolate
not to shrink from any crime (idiom); to commit any imaginable misdeed
many men, a great force (idiom); many hands provide great strength/There is safety in numbers.
lit. dragons and snakes mingle (idiom)/fig. a mix of good people and scumbags
to leave one's native place, esp. against one's will (idiom)
